sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const MessagesPro = () => { return (

MS in DS Academic Program

Student Messages Instructor Logout

Messages

Stay connected with your instructors and peers through messaging. You can send and receive messages here.

New Messages:

From: Prof. Anderson
Date: October 10, 2023
Subject: Assignment Submission

Hello, please remember to submit your assignment by the deadline. Thank you!

From: John Doe
Date: October 12, 2023
Subject: Group Project

Hi, we need to discuss our group project. When are you available to meet?

@ copyright MS in DS Academic Program

); }; export default MessagesPro;
